ç»„åˆå¼API â€‹

<script setup> //è‡ªåŠ¨æš´éœ²æ•°æ®å’Œæ–¹æ³•

  • æ¯ä¸ª *.vue æ–‡ä»¶æœ€å¤šåªèƒ½æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª <script setup> å— (ä¸åŒ…æ‹¬å¸¸è§„çš„ <script>)

ref â€‹

æ¥å—ä¸€ä¸ªå†…éƒ¨å€¼å¹¶è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå“åº”å¼ä¸”å¯å˜çš„ ref å¯¹è±¡ã€‚ref å¯¹è±¡ä»…æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª .value propertyï¼ŒæŒ‡å‘è¯¥å†…éƒ¨å€¼ã€‚

vue
<template>
  <div>{{Man}}</div>
  <div>{{age}}</div>
  <button @click="change()">ä¿®æ”¹</button>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import {ref,isRef} from 'vue'
  const Man = ref({name:"å°ä½™"})
  const age = ref(12)
  const change = () =>{
    Man.value.name = 'yupi'
    age.value=18
    console.log(Man)
    console.log(isRef(Man))
  }
</script>

reactive â€‹

ä¸åŒäºrefï¼Œreactiveåªèƒ½å¤„ç†å¯¹è±¡ä¸æ•°ç»„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸éœ€è¦.value,å› ä¸ºä½¿ç”¨äº†Proxyçš„å®ä¾‹åŒ–å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç®€ç§°proxyå¯¹è±¡

  	Man:'å°å¼ 'ï¼Œ

refä¸reactiveæ¯”è¾ƒ â€‹

hooksï¼ˆé’©å­ï¼‰ â€‹

  • computed: åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè®¡ç®—å±æ€§
js
import { ref, computed } from 'vue';

const count = ref(0);
const doubleCount = computed(() => count.value * 2);

console.log(doubleCount.value); // è¾“å‡ºï¼š0

count.value = 5;
console.log(doubleCount.value); // è¾“å‡ºï¼š10
  • watch: ç›‘å¬ä¸€ä¸ªå“åº”å¼å¯¹è±¡çš„å˜åŒ–
js
import { ref, watch } from 'vue';

const count = ref(0);

watch(count, (newValue, oldValue) => {
  console.log(`countçš„å€¼ä»\${oldValue}å˜ä¸º\${newValue}`);
});

count.value = 5; // è¾“å‡ºï¼šcountçš„å€¼ä»0å˜ä¸º5

  • onMounted: åœ¨ç»„ä»¶è¢«æŒ‚è½½åˆ°DOMåæ‰§è¡Œçš„é’©å­å‡½æ•°

  • onUnmounted: åœ¨ç»„ä»¶è¢«ä»DOMä¸­å¸è½½åæ‰§è¡Œçš„é’©å­å‡½æ•°

è‡ªå®šä¹‰hooksï¼ˆé’©å­ï¼‰ â€‹

é€»è¾‘å¤ç”¨,åˆ†ç¦»å…³æ³¨ç‚¹,æé«˜å¯æµ‹è¯•æ€§,æé«˜ç»„ä»¶çš„å¯è¯»æ€§,æ¥è¿‘å‡½æ•°å¼ç¼–ç¨‹

æ¨èvueUseå®˜ç½‘ï¼ˆhookså¤§å…¨ï¼‰

  • ç¼–å†™
js
//å¼•ç”¨
import {reactive,onMounted,onBeforeUnmount} from 'vue'
//æš´éœ²æ–¹æ³•
export default function (){
	//å®šä¹‰æ•°æ®
	let point = reactive({
		x:0,
		y:0
	})
	//å®šä¹‰æ–¹æ³•
	function savePoint(e){
		point.x=e.pageX
		point.y=e.pageY
	}
	//é’©å­å‡½æ•°
	onMounted(()=>{
		window.addEventListen('click',savePoint)
	})
	onBeforeUnmount(()=>{
		window.removeEventListen('click',savePoint)
	})
	return point
}
  • ä½¿ç”¨
js
import {usePoint} from '../hooks/usePoint'
let point = usePoint()
let x = userPoint().x
let y = poin

ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸ â€‹

js
console.log('set up');
// åˆ›å»º
onBeforeMount(() => {
    console.log('onBeforeMount=======>', data.value);
})
onMounted(() => {
    console.log('onMounted=======>', data.value);
})
// æ›´æ–°hook
onBeforeUpdate(() => {
    console.log('onBeforeUpdate=======>', data.value?.innerHTML);
})
onUpdated(() => {
    console.log('onUpdated=======>', data.value?.innerHTML);
})
// é”€æ¯
onBeforeUnmount(() => {
    console.log('onBeforeUnmount=======>', data.value);
})
onUnmounted(() => {
    console.log('onUnmounted=======>', data.value);
})

çˆ¶å­ç»„ä»¶ä¼ å‚ â€‹

çˆ¶ä¼ å­(ç»„ä»¶)--vue2 â€‹

åœ¨Vue 3ä¸­ï¼Œçˆ¶å­ç»„ä»¶ä¹‹é—´å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡propså’Œäº‹ä»¶æ¥å®ç°äº’ç›¸ä¼ å€¼ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸¤ç§å¸¸è§çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼š

  1. ä½¿ç”¨propsä¼ é€’æ•°æ®ï¼šçˆ¶ç»„ä»¶é€šè¿‡propså±æ€§å°†æ•°æ®ä¼ é€’ç»™å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œå­ç»„ä»¶é€šè¿‡propsæ¥æ”¶æ•°æ®ã€‚

çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ï¼š

vue

  <div>
    <ChildComponent :message="message" />
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import ChildComponent from './ChildComponent.vue';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      message: 'Hello from parent component',
    };
  },
  components: {
    ChildComponent,
  },
};
</script>

å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼š

vue

  <div>
    <p>{{ message }}</p>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {[message]},
};
</script>

å­ä¼ çˆ¶(ç»„ä»¶)--vue2 â€‹

  1. ä½¿ç”¨äº‹ä»¶è¿›è¡Œä¼ å€¼ï¼šå­ç»„ä»¶é€šè¿‡è§¦å‘äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå‘çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ä¼ é€’æ•°æ®ã€‚çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ç›‘å¬å­ç»„ä»¶çš„äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œè·å–ä¼ é€’çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚

çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ï¼š

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <ChildComponent @message-updated="updateMessage" />
    <p>{{ message }}</p>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import ChildComponent from './ChildComponent.vue';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      message: '',
    };
  },
  methods: {
    updateMessage(newMessage) {
      this.message = newMessage;
    },
  },
  components: {
    ChildComponent,
  },
};
</script>

å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼š

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <button @click="sendMessage">Send Message</button>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  methods: {
    sendMessage() {
      this.\$emit('message-updated', 'Hello from child component');
    },
  },
};
</script>

definePropsä¸defineEmits--vue3 â€‹

  • defineProps å’Œ defineEmits éƒ½æ˜¯åªèƒ½åœ¨ <script setup> ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨çš„ç¼–è¯‘å™¨å®ã€‚ä»–ä»¬ä¸éœ€è¦å¯¼å…¥ï¼Œä¸”ä¼šéšç€ <script setup> çš„å¤„ç†è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸€åŒè¢«ç¼–è¯‘æ‰ã€‚
  • defineProps æ¥æ”¶ä¸ props é€‰é¡¹ç›¸åŒçš„å€¼ï¼ŒdefineEmits æ¥æ”¶ä¸ emits é€‰é¡¹ç›¸åŒçš„å€¼ã€‚
  • defineProps å’Œ defineEmits åœ¨é€‰é¡¹ä¼ å…¥åï¼Œä¼šæä¾›æ°å½“çš„ç±»å‹æ¨å¯¼ã€‚
  • ä¼ å…¥åˆ° defineProps å’Œ defineEmits çš„é€‰é¡¹ä¼šä» setup ä¸­æå‡åˆ°æ¨¡å—çš„ä½œç”¨åŸŸã€‚å› æ­¤ï¼Œä¼ å…¥çš„é€‰é¡¹ä¸èƒ½å¼•ç”¨åœ¨ setup ä½œç”¨åŸŸä¸­å£°æ˜çš„å±€éƒ¨å˜é‡ã€‚è¿™æ ·åšä¼šå¼•èµ·ç¼–è¯‘é”™è¯¯ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œå®ƒå¯ä»¥å¼•ç”¨å¯¼å…¥çš„ç»‘å®šï¼Œå› ä¸ºå®ƒä»¬ä¹Ÿåœ¨æ¨¡å—ä½œç”¨åŸŸå†…ã€‚

çˆ¶ä¼ å­

vue
//çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ä¼ é€’
<template>
    <About :msg=msg/>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import About from './about.vue'
import { ref } from 'vue'
let msg = ref("Vite Vue")
</script>

//å­ç»„ä»¶æ¥æ”¶
<template>
    <h1>{{ props.msg }}</h1>
</template>
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
let num = ref(123)
// tsæ–¹å¼çˆ¶ä¼ å­ï¼ˆæ ‡æ³¨ï¼‰
export interface Props {
  msg?: string
}
const props = withDefaults(defineProps<Props>(), {
  msg: 'hhh',
})

// jsæ–¹å¼çˆ¶ä¼ å­ï¼ˆdefinePropsï¼‰
const props = defineProps({
    msg: {
         type: String,
         default: 'hhh'
    }
})
</script>

å­ä¼ çˆ¶

vue
//å­ç»„ä»¶ä¼ é€’
<template>
    <h1>{{ props.msg }}</h1>
    {{ num }}
    <button @click="send">send</button>
</template>
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
let num = ref(123)

	// jsæ–¹æ³•å­ä¼ çˆ¶ï¼ˆdefineEmitsï¼‰
const emit = defineEmits(["fn"])
const send=()=>{
    emit("fn", num)
}

	// tsæ–¹å¼å­ä¼ çˆ¶ï¼ˆæ ‡æ³¨ï¼‰
const emit = defineEmits<{
  (e: 'fn', num: number): void
}>()
const send=()=>{
    emit("fn", num.value)
}
</script>

//çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶æ¥æ”¶
<template>
    çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶å€¼ï¼š{{ num }}  
    <br>
    <About @fn='fuck'/>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import About from './about.vue'
import { ref } from 'vue'
let num = ref(0)
const fuck = (n: number) => {
    num.value=n
}
</script>

v-modelå®ç°çˆ¶å­ç»„ä»¶ä¹‹é—´ä¼ å‚ â€‹

vue
//çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶
<template>
    <button @click="show = !show">å¼€å…³{{ show }}</button>
    <Dialog v-model="show"></Dialog>
</template>
   
<script setup lang='ts'>
import Dialog from "../components/dialog.vue";
import { ref } from 'vue'
const show = ref(false)
</script>

//å­ç»„ä»¶
<template>
    <div v-if='propData.modelValue ' class="dialog">
        <div class="dialog-header">
            <div>æ ‡é¢˜</div><div @click="close">x</div>
        </div>
        <div class="dialog-content">
           å†…å®¹
        </div>
    </div>
</template>

<script setup lang='ts'>

type Props = {
  modelValue:boolean
}
const propData = defineProps<Props>()
const emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue'])
const close = () => {
    emit('update:modelValue',false)
}
</script>

<style lang='less' scoped>
.dialog{
   width: 300px;
   height: 300px;
   border: 1px solid #ccc;
   position: fixed;
   left:50%;
   top:50%;
   transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
   &-header{
       border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;
       display: flex;
       justify-content: space-between;
       padding: 10px;
   }
   &-content{
       padding: 10px;
   }
}
</style>

é€’å½’ç»„ä»¶ â€‹

vue
<!-- çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ -->
<template>
    <div @click.stop="clickItem(item,$event)" v-for="(item, index) in data" :key="index" class="tree">
        <input type="checkbox" v-model="item.checked"> <span>{{ item.name }}</span>
        <tree :data="item.children" v-if="item.children?.length"></tree>
    </div>
</template>
    
<script setup lang='ts'>
import tree from '../views/tree.vue';
type TreeList = {
    name: string;
    checked: boolean;
    children?: TreeList[] | [];
};

type Props<T> = {
    data?: T[] | [];
};

defineProps<Props<TreeList>>();
const clickItem = (item: TreeList,e:any) => {
    console.log(item,e)
}
</script>
    
<style lang="less" scoped>
.tree{
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}
</style>
<!-- å­ç»„ä»¶ -->
<template>
    <div @click.stop="clickItem(item,$event)" v-for="(item, index) in data" :key="index" class="tree">
        <input type="checkbox" v-model="item.checked"> <span>{{ item.name }}</span>
        <tree :data="item.children" v-if="item.children?.length"></tree>
    </div>
</template>
    
<script setup lang='ts'>
import tree from '../views/tree.vue';
type TreeList = {
    name: string;
    checked?: string;
    children?: TreeList[] | [];
};

type Props<T> = {
    data?: T[] | [];
};

defineProps<Props<TreeList>>();
const clickItem = (item: TreeList,e:any) => {
    console.log(item,e)
}
</script>
    
<style lang="less" scoped>
.tree{
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}
</style>

åŠ¨æ€ç»„ä»¶ â€‹

vue
<template>
    <div style="display: flex;">
        <div v-for="(item, index) in data" 
        class="tabs" :class="[active == index ? 'active' : '']"
        @click="switchOne(index,item)">
            {{ item.name }}
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="content">
        <component :is="componentId"></component>
    </div>
</template>
    
<script setup lang='ts'>
import { ref, reactive, markRaw } from "vue"
import AVue from '../components/more/A.vue'
import BVue from '../components/more/B.vue'
import CVue from '../components/more/C.vue'
let componentId = ref(markRaw(AVue))
let active = ref(0)

interface Tabs {//å®šä¹‰ç±»å‹
    name: string,
    com: any
}
const data = reactive<Tabs[]>([
    {
        name: 'A',
        com: markRaw(AVue) 
    },
    {
        name: 'B',
        com: markRaw(BVue) 
    },
    {
        name: 'C',
        com: markRaw(CVue) 
    }
])
const switchOne=(idx:any,item:Tabs)=>{
    active.value=idx
    componentId.value=item.com
}
</script>
    
<style lang="less" scoped>
.tabs {
    border: 1px solid black;
    padding: 1rem;
    margin: auto;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.active {
    background: skyblue;
}
.content{
    border: 1px solid black;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 10px;
}
</style>

keep-aliveï¼ˆç¼“å­˜åŠŸèƒ½ï¼‰ â€‹

keep-aliveå°±æ˜¯ä¿æŒæ´»è·ƒçš„æ„æ€ï¼Œä½ åœ¨é‡Œé¢å¡«å…¥çš„ä¸œè¥¿åœ¨ä½ åˆ‡æ¢æˆå…¶ä»–ç»„ä»¶çš„æ—¶å€™ä¸ä¼šè¢«åˆå§‹åŒ–æˆæœ€åˆçš„æ ·å­

include å’Œ exclude

include å’Œ exclude å…è®¸ç»„ä»¶æœ‰æ¡ä»¶åœ°ç¼“å­˜ã€‚äºŒè€…éƒ½å¯ä»¥ç”¨é€—å·åˆ†éš”å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼æˆ–ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºï¼š

å†™åœ¨includeé‡Œé¢çš„ç»„ä»¶ä¼šè¢«ç¼“å­˜èµ·æ¥ï¼Œåªå†™keep-aliveæ˜¯é»˜è®¤é‡Œé¢ä¿¡æ¯å…¨éƒ¨ç¼“å­˜çš„

å†™åœ¨excludeé‡Œé¢çš„ç»„ä»¶ä¸ä¼šè¢«ç¼“å­˜èµ·æ¥ï¼Œè·Ÿincludeçš„å±æ€§æ˜¯å®Œå…¨ç›¸åçš„ã€‚å¦‚ä½•é€‰æ‹©ä½¿ç”¨å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®å®é™…æƒ…å†µé€‰æ‹©

:maxå±æ€§æ˜¯å†³å®šäº†æˆ‘ä»¬ç¼“å­˜çš„æœ€å¤§ç»„ä»¶æ•°é‡ï¼Œå‡è®¾æˆ‘ä»¬:max="10"ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æœ€å¤šç¼“å­˜10ä¸ªç»„ä»¶ï¼Œå¯æˆ‘ä»¬keep-aliveå†…éƒ¨å³å°†ç¼“å­˜çš„æœ‰11ä¸ªç»„ä»¶ï¼Œä»–æœ‰å†…ç½®ç®—æ³•ä¼šä¼˜å…ˆæ›¿æ¢æ‰æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸å¸¸ç”¨çš„é‚£ä¸€ä¸ª

ä¸“å±çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªç”Ÿå‘½ç»„ä»¶

ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥Provide / Inject â€‹

APIä»‹ç»ï¼šçˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ç”¨ProvideæŠ›å‡ºæ•°æ®ï¼Œå­ç»„ä»¶ç”¨Injectå¼•ç”¨æ•°æ®

js

//å­ç»„ä»¶

    flag.value ++

å…„å¼Ÿç»„ä»¶ä¼ å‚å’ŒBus â€‹

æ–¹å¼1ï¼šå­ä¼ çˆ¶==>çˆ¶ä¼ å­

æ–¹å¼2ï¼šBUS(æœ‰ç‚¹éš¾ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸å’‹ç”¨)

æ–¹å¼3ï¼šMITT(åˆ«äººå°è£…æ–¹å¼2çš„ä¸€ä¸ªåº“ï¼Œæœ‰ç©ºå†å­¦)

typescript
type BusClass<T> = {
    emit: (name: T) => void
    on: (name: T, callback: Function) => void
}
type BusParams = string | number | symbol 
type List = {
    [key: BusParams]: Array<Function>
}
class Bus<T extends BusParams> implements BusClass<T> {
    list: List
    constructor() {
        this.list = {}
    }
    emit(name: T, ...args: Array<any>) {
        let eventName: Array<Function> = this.list[name]
        eventName.forEach(ev => {
            ev.apply(this, args)
        })
    }
    on(name: T, callback: Function) {
        let fn: Array<Function> = this.list[name] || [];
        fn.push(callback)
        this.list[name] = fn
    }
}
 
export default new Bus<number>()

jsx
# é€‰æ‹©ä¸€ä¸ªä½ å–œæ¬¢çš„åŒ…ç®¡ç†å™¨

# NPM
$ npm install element-plus --save

# Yarn
$ yarn add element-plus

# pnpm
$ pnpm install element-plus


// main.ts
import { createApp } from 'vue'
import ElementPlus from 'element-plus'
import 'element-plus/dist/index.css'
import App from './App.vue'

const app = createApp(App)

app.use(ElementPlus)
app.mount('#app')

// tsconfig.json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    // ...
    "types": ["element-plus/global"]
  }
}
